testcase.name: The static buy method returns a new remote controlled car instance
The distanceDisplay method shows 0 meters message on a new car
The distanceDisplay method shows the correct message after driving once
The batteryDisplay method shows the correct message after driving once
The distanceDisplay method shows the correct message after driving and draining all battery

failure.message: org.opentest4j.AssertionFailedError: expected: "Driven 2000 meters" but was: "Driven 2020 meters"

testcase.failure: org.opentest4j.AssertionFailedError: expected: "Driven 2000 meters" but was: "Driven 2020 meters" at java.base@21.0.6/jdk.internal.reflect.DirectConstructorHandleAccessor.newInstance(DirectConstructorHandleAccessor.java:62) at java.base@21.0.6/java.lang.reflect.Constructor.newInstanceWithCaller(Constructor.java:502) at app//JedliksToyCarTest.distance_display_when_battery_empty(JedliksToyCarTest.java:117) at java.base@21.0.6/java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Method.java:580) at java.base@21.0.6/java.util.ArrayList.forEach(ArrayList.java:1596) at java.base@21.0.6/java.util.ArrayList.forEach(ArrayList.java:1596)

testcase.name: The batteryDisplay method shows battery empty after draining all battery
The batteryDisplay method shows the correct battery percentage after driving multiple times
The static buy method returns each time a new remote controlled car instance
The distanceDisplay method shows the correct message after driving multiple times
The batteryDisplay method shows full battery message on a new car
